mapper.select: SELECT i_id, i_bus_unit_id, i_bus_model_id, i_bus_function_id, i_order, s_name, s_doc_rule, i_doc_num, i_utemplate_id, i_dtemplate_id, i_atemplate_id, s_remarks, s_create_by, d_create_time, s_update_by, d_update_time FROM oa_docnum WHERE i_id = #{id} and i_bus_unit_id = #{iBusUnitId}

SELECT bf.i_id, bf.i_bus_model_id, bf.s_name FROM oa_bus_function bf LEFT JOIN oa_bus_function_unit bfu ON bfu.i_bus_function_id = bf.i_id WHERE bf.i_bus_model_id = #{iBusModelId} AND bfu.s_unit_id = #{iBusUnitId}
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(s_dept_id) FROM oa_docnum_dept WHERE i_docnum_id = #{docId}
SELECT id, depart_name FROM sys_depart WHERE id in (${depIdList})

SELECT od.i_id, od.s_name FROM oa_docnum as od LEFT JOIN oa_docnum_dept as op ON op.i_docnum_id = od.i_id WHERE od.i_bus_function_id = #{iBusFunctionId} and i_bus_unit_id=#{iBusUnitId} AND (op.s_dept_id = "" OR op.s_dept_id = #{sDeptId})
SELECT m.s_busdata_table s_busdata_table ,m.i_busdata_id i_busdata_id from oa_docnum d LEFT JOIN oa_docnum_manage m ON m.i_docnum_id = d.i_id WHERE d.i_id = #{docId}

SELECT bf.s_name s_left_parameter, bus.s_file_num s_file_num, bus.i_create_year i_create_year, bus.s_title s_title, bus.s_create_dept s_create_dept, bus.s_create_name s_create_name, bus.d_create_time d_create_time FROM ${table} bus LEFT JOIN oa_bus_function bf ON bf.i_id = bus.i_bus_function_id WHERE bus.i_id = #{iid}
